00041 public class SmartMenuOverlayView extends GestureOverlayView implements OnGesturePerformedListener {
00042         // These two values will be modified according to the layout size...
00043         protected static int sCenterRadius = 32;
00044         protected static int sBranchesLength = 24;
00045         // ...but not this one
00046         protected static int sBranchesRadius = 24;
00047         
00048         // Edit these to change the drawing speed
00049         protected static int sCircleSpeed = 30;
00050         protected static int sLineSpeed = 10;
00051         
00052         // These values will be modified according to the layout size and orientation
00053         protected static int sLabelMargin = 10;
00054         protected static int sLabelHeight = 50;
00055         protected static int sLabelWidth = 200;
00056         protected static int sLabelFont = 30;
00057 
00058         // Halo parameters
00059         protected boolean mDisplayHalo = true;
00060         
00061 
00062         protected int mHaloRadius = 30;
00063         protected int mHaloGradient = 15;
00064         
00065         protected int mHaloCenterColor = Color.argb(100, 128, 128, 128);
00066         protected int mHaloOutsideColor = Color.argb(10, 255, 255, 255);
00067         
00068         // Make these static to compute them only once
00069         protected static final double RAD_45 = Math.PI/4;
00070         protected static final double COS_45 = Math.cos(RAD_45);
00071         protected static final double SIN_45 = Math.sin(RAD_45);

00097         private void init(Context context) {
00098                 mCircleView = new SmartMenuCircleView(context, this);
00099                 mCircleView.setVisibility(INVISIBLE);
00100                 addView(mCircleView);
00101                 
00102                 addOnGesturePerformedListener(this);
00103         }

00262         public void open(boolean animate) {
00263                 bringChildToFront(mCircleView);
00264                 mCircleView.reset();
00265                 mCircleView.setVisibility(VISIBLE);
00266                 setGestureVisible(false);
00267                 setEventsInterceptionEnabled(false);
00268                 
00269                 // Skip the animation
00270                 if (!animate) {
00271                         mCircleView.setAnimationEnd();
00272                 }
00273         }
00274         
00278         public void close() {
00279                 mCircleView.close();
00280         }
00281         
00285         public boolean isOpened() {
00286                 return (mCircleView.getVisibility() == VISIBLE);
00287         }
00288 
00289         @Override
00290         public void onGesturePerformed(GestureOverlayView overlay, Gesture gesture) {
00291                 ArrayList<Prediction> predictions = mLibrary.recognize(gesture);
00292                 
00293                 // We want at least one prediction
00294                 if (predictions.size() > 0) {
00295                         Prediction prediction = predictions.get(0);
00296                         // We want at least some confidence in the result
00297                         if (prediction.score > 1.0) {
00298                                 open(true);
00299                         }
00300                 }
00301         }
00302         
00303         protected static class SmartMenuCircleView extends View {
00304                 private int mCenterX, mCenterY;
00305                 private int mCurrentAngle = 0;
00306                 private int mCurrentBranch = 0;
00307                 private int mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00308                 
00309                 protected float         mHaloX = 0;
00310                 protected float         mHaloY = 0;
00311                 protected boolean       mDrawHalo = false;
00312                 
00313                 private boolean                                 mComputedValues = false;
00314                 private Paint                                   mPainter;
00315                 private SmartMenuOverlayView    mParent;
00316                 private String                                  mText = null;
00317                 private Vector<SmartMenuItem>   mItems;
00318                 
00319                 public SmartMenuCircleView(Context context, SmartMenuOverlayView parent) {
00320                         super(context);
00321                         this.mParent = parent;
00322                         init();
00323                 }
00324                 
00325                 protected void init() {
00326                         setFocusable(true);
00327                         setFocusableInTouchMode(true);
00328                         
00329                         setBackgroundColor(Color.argb(200, 0, 0, 0));
00330                         // Init the painter, set parameters here
00331                         mPainter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00332                         mPainter.setStyle(Paint.Style.STROKE);
00333                         mPainter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00334                         mPainter.setStrokeWidth(3);
00335                         mPainter.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);
00336                         mItems = new Vector<SmartMenuItem>();
00337                 }
00338                 
00339                 protected void reset() {
00340                         mCurrentAngle = 0;
00341                         mCurrentBranch = 0;
00342                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00343                         mComputedValues = false;
00344                         setText(null);
00345                         requestFocus();
00346                 }
00347                 
00348                 protected void close() {
00349                         setVisibility(INVISIBLE);
00350                         mParent.clear(false);
00351                         mParent.setGestureVisible(true);
00352                         mParent.setEventsInterceptionEnabled(true);
00353                 }
00354                 
00355                 protected void setAnimationEnd() {
00356                         mCurrentAngle = 360;
00357                         mCurrentBranch = mItems.size();
00358                 }
00359                 
00360                 protected void addMenuItem(SmartMenuItem item) {
00361                         mItems.add(item);
00362                 }
00363                 
00364                 protected SmartMenuItem getMenuItem(int index) {
00365                         return mItems.get(index);
00366                 }
00367                 
00368                 protected boolean deleteMenuItem(SmartMenuItem item) {
00369                         return mItems.remove(item);
00370                 }
00371                 
00372                 protected void insertMenuItemAt(SmartMenuItem item, int index) {
00373                         mItems.insertElementAt(item, index);
00374                 }
00375                 
00376                 protected int indexOf(SmartMenuItem item) {
00377                         return mItems.indexOf(item);
00378                 }
00379                 
00380                 @Override
00381                 public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) {
00382                         switch (event.getAction()) {
00383                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN:
00384                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE:
00385                                 mDrawHalo = true;
00386                                 mHaloX = event.getX();
00387                                 mHaloY = event.getY();
00388                                 
00389                                 boolean isInMenu = false;
00390                                 for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); i++) {
00391                                         int x = mItems.get(i).getX();
00392                                         int y = mItems.get(i).getY();
00393                                         
00394                                         if (Math.sqrt( (event.getX() - x)*(event.getX() - x) + (event.getY() - y) * (event.getY() - y) ) <= sBranchesRadius) {
00395                                                 if (getText() == null || getText().equals(mItems.get(i).getText())) {
00396                                                         setText(mItems.get(i).getText());
00397                                                         //invalidate();
00398                                                 }
00399                                                 isInMenu = true;
00400                                         }
00401                                 }
00402                                 if (!isInMenu) {
00403                                         if (getText() != null) {
00404                                                 setText(null);
00405                                                 //invalidate();
00406                                         }
00407                                 }
00408                                 invalidate();
00409                                 break;
00410                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_UP:
00411                                 mDrawHalo = false;
00412                                 for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); i++) {
00413                                         int x = mItems.get(i).getX();
00414                                         int y = mItems.get(i).getY();
00415                                         
00416                                         if (Math.sqrt( (event.getX() - x)*(event.getX() - x) + (event.getY() - y) * (event.getY() - y) ) <= sBranchesRadius) {
00417                                                 if (mItems.get(i).onItemSelected()) {
00418                                                         // Close the menu
00419                                                         close();
00420                                                 }
00421                                         }
00422                                 }
00423                                 invalidate();
00424                                 break;
00425                         default:
00426                         }
00427                         return true;
00428                 }
00429                 
00430                 @Override
00431                 public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode, KeyEvent event) {
00432                         if (keyCode == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BACK) {
00433                                 close();
00434                         }
00435                         return true;
00436                 }
00437 
00438                 @Override
00439                 public void onDraw(Canvas canvas) {
00440                         // Init global values
00441                         if (!mComputedValues) { // Do it only once until reset
00442                                 if (getMeasuredHeight() > 400) {
00443                                         sLabelHeight = 40;
00444                                         sLabelMargin = 10;
00445                                         sLabelFont = 30;
00446                                 } else {
00447                                         sLabelHeight = 20;
00448                                         sLabelMargin = 5;
00449                                         sLabelFont = 15;
00450                                 }
00451                                 
00452                                 if (getMeasuredWidth() > getMeasuredHeight()) {
00453                                         // Landscape
00454                                         sBranchesLength = sCenterRadius = getMeasuredHeight() / 4 - sBranchesRadius - 5;
00455                                         sLabelWidth = getMeasuredWidth()/2 - sCenterRadius * 2 - sBranchesRadius * 2 - sLabelMargin;
00456                                 } else {
00457                                         // Portrait
00458                                         sBranchesLength = sCenterRadius = getMeasuredWidth() / 4 - sBranchesRadius - 5;
00459                                         sLabelWidth = getMeasuredWidth() - 2 * sLabelMargin;
00460                                 }
00461                                 
00462                                 mCenterX = getMeasuredWidth() / 2 ;
00463                                 mCenterY = getMeasuredHeight() / 2 ;
00464                                 
00465                                 mComputedValues = true;
00466                         }
00467                         
00468                         // Draw the halo if the user touch the screen
00469                         if (mDrawHalo && mParent.mDisplayHalo) {
00470                                 drawHalo(canvas);
00471                         }
00472                                                 
00473                         // Draw the label only if necessary
00474                         if (mText != null && mText.length() > 0) {
00475                                 drawLabel(canvas, mText);
00476                         }
00477                         
00478                         // Draw the centered circle
00479                         canvas.drawArc(new RectF(mCenterX-sCenterRadius, mCenterY-sCenterRadius, mCenterX+sCenterRadius, mCenterY+sCenterRadius),
00480                                         -90, mCurrentAngle, false, mPainter);
00481                         
00482                         if (mCurrentAngle < 360) {
00483                                 mCurrentAngle += sCircleSpeed;
00484                                 invalidate();
00485                                 return;
00486                         } else {
00487                                 // End of circle, draw branches
00488                                 if (mItems.size() <= 4) {
00489                                         // Use positions 0, 2, 4, 6
00490                                         for (int i=0; i<mCurrentBranch; i++) {
00491                                                 drawBranch(canvas, i*2, sBranchesLength, mItems.get(i));
00492                                         }
00493                                         
00494                                         if (mCurrentBranch < mItems.size()) {
00495                                                 drawBranch(canvas, mCurrentBranch*2, mCurrentBranchLength, mItems.get(mCurrentBranch));
00496                                                 
00497                                                 if (mCurrentBranchLength >= sBranchesLength) {
00498                                                         // Go to the next branch
00499                                                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00500                                                         mCurrentBranch++;
00501                                                 } else {
00502                                                         mCurrentBranchLength += sLineSpeed;
00503                                                 }
00504                                                 invalidate();
00505                                                 return;
00506                                         } else {
00507                                                 // Ended
00508                                         }
00509                                 } else {
00510                                         // Use all positions
00511                                         for (int i=0; i<mCurrentBranch; i++) {
00512                                                 drawBranch(canvas, i, sBranchesLength, mItems.get(i));
00513                                         }
00514                                         
00515                                         if (mCurrentBranch < mItems.size()) {
00516                                                 drawBranch(canvas, mCurrentBranch, mCurrentBranchLength, mItems.get(mCurrentBranch));
00517                                                 
00518                                                 if (mCurrentBranchLength >= sBranchesLength) {
00519                                                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00520                                                         mCurrentBranch++;
00521                                                 } else {
00522                                                         mCurrentBranchLength += sLineSpeed;
00523                                                 }
00524                                                 invalidate();
00525                                                 return;
00526                                         } else {
00527                                                 // Ended
00528                                         }
00529                                 }
00530                         }
00531                 }
00532                 
00533                 private void drawBranch(Canvas canvas, int position, int length, SmartMenuItem icon) {
00534                         float x1=0, x2=0, y1=0, y2=0, x3=0, y3=0;
00535                         switch (position) {
00536                         case 0:
00537                                 x1 = x2 = x3 = mCenterX;
00538                                 y1 = mCenterY - sCenterRadius;
00539                                 y2 = y1 - length;
00540                                 y3 = y2 - sBranchesRadius;
00541                                 break;
00542                         case 1:
00543                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX + COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00544                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY - SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00545                                 x2 = (float)(x1 + COS_45 * length);
00546                                 y2 = (float)(y1 - SIN_45 * length);
00547                                 x3 = (float)(x2 + COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00548                                 y3 = (float)(y2 - SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00549                                 break;
00550                         case 2:
00551                                 y1 = y2 = y3 = mCenterY;
00552                                 x1 = mCenterX + sCenterRadius;
00553                                 x2 = x1 + length;
00554                                 x3 = x2 + sBranchesRadius;
00555                                 break;
00556                         case 3:
00557                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX + COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00558                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY + SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00559                                 x2 = (float)(x1 + COS_45 * length);
00560                                 y2 = (float)(y1 + SIN_45 * length);
00561                                 x3 = (float)(x2 + COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00562                                 y3 = (float)(y2 + SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00563                                 break;
00564                         case 4:
00565                                 x1 = x2 = x3 = mCenterX;
00566                                 y1 = mCenterY + sCenterRadius;
00567                                 y2 = y1 + length;
00568                                 y3 = y2 + sBranchesRadius;
00569                                 break;
00570                         case 5:
00571                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX - COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00572                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY + SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00573                                 x2 = (float)(x1 - COS_45 * length);
00574                                 y2 = (float)(y1 + SIN_45 * length);
00575                                 x3 = (float)(x2 - COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00576                                 y3 = (float)(y2 + SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00577                                 break;
00578                         case 6:
00579                                 y1 = y2 = y3 = mCenterY;
00580                                 x1 = mCenterX - sCenterRadius;
00581                                 x2 = x1 - length;
00582                                 x3 = x2 - sBranchesRadius;
00583                                 break;
00584                         case 7:
00585                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX - COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00586                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY - SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00587                                 x2 = (float)(x1 - COS_45 * length);
00588                                 y2 = (float)(y1 - SIN_45 * length);
00589                                 x3 = (float)(x2 - COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00590                                 y3 = (float)(y2 - SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00591                                 break;
00592                         default:
00593                                 return;
00594                         }
00595                         
00596                         canvas.drawLine(x1, y1, x2, y2, mPainter);
00597                         // Draw the final circle
00598                         if (length >= sBranchesLength) {
00599                                 icon.setPosition((int)x3, (int)y3);
00600                                 canvas.drawBitmap(icon.getIcon(), x3 - sBranchesRadius, y3 - sBranchesRadius, mPainter);
00601                                 canvas.drawCircle(x3, y3, sBranchesRadius, mPainter);
00602                         }
00603                 }
00604         
00605                 private void drawLabel(Canvas canvas, String text) {
00606                         RectF rect = new RectF(sLabelMargin, sLabelMargin, sLabelMargin + sLabelWidth, sLabelMargin + sLabelHeight);
00607                         canvas.drawRoundRect(rect, 10, 10, mPainter);
00608                         Paint textPainter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00609                         textPainter.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);
00610                         textPainter.setTextSize(sLabelFont);
00611                         textPainter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00612                         canvas.drawText(mText, sLabelMargin + sLabelWidth/2, sLabelMargin*2 + sLabelHeight/2, textPainter);
00613                 }
00614                 
00615                 private void drawHalo(Canvas canvas) {
00616                         // Separate the colors components
00617                         int ao, ro, go, bo, ac, rc, gc, bc;
00618                         
00619                         ao = Color.alpha(mParent.mHaloOutsideColor);
00620                         ro = Color.red(mParent.mHaloOutsideColor);
00621                         go = Color.green(mParent.mHaloOutsideColor);
00622                         bo = Color.blue(mParent.mHaloOutsideColor);
00623                         
00624                         ac = Color.alpha(mParent.mHaloCenterColor);
00625                         rc = Color.red(mParent.mHaloCenterColor);
00626                         gc = Color.green(mParent.mHaloCenterColor);
00627                         bc = Color.blue(mParent.mHaloCenterColor);
00628                         
00629                         for (int i=0; i<=mParent.mHaloGradient; i++) {
00630                                 Paint painter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00631                                 painter.setColor(Color.argb(
00632                                                 ao + (ac - ao)/mParent.mHaloGradient * i,
00633                                                 ro + (rc - ro)/mParent.mHaloGradient * i,
00634                                                 go + (gc - go)/mParent.mHaloGradient * i,
00635                                                 bo + (bc - bo)/mParent.mHaloGradient * i
00636                                 ));
00637                                 painter.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL);
00638                                 canvas.drawCircle(mHaloX, mHaloY, mParent.mHaloRadius - (mParent.mHaloRadius/mParent.mHaloGradient) * i, painter);
00639                         }
00640                 }

00643                         this.mText = text;

00646                 public String getText() {
00647                         return mText;

00655         public static class SmartMenuItem {
00656                 private String mText;
00657                 private Bitmap mIcon;
00658                 // Position is used to test if the user is touching one of the elements
00659                 private int mX = 0, mY = 0;
00660

00666                         this.mText = text;
00667                         this.setIcon(icon);
00668                 }
00669 
00673                 public void setText(String text) {
00674                         this.mText = text;
00675                 }
00676 
00680                 public String getText() {
00681                         return mText;
00682                 }
00683 
00687                 public void setIcon(Bitmap icon) {
00688                         this.mIcon = SmartMenuIconFactory.createRoundedBitmap(icon);
00689                 }
00690 
00694                 public Bitmap getIcon() {
00695                         return mIcon;
00696                 }

00740                         return true;

00744         public static class SmartMenuIconFactory {
00749                 public static Bitmap createRoundedBitmap(Bitmap input) {
00750                         Bitmap output = Bitmap.createScaledBitmap(input, sBranchesRadius * 2, sBranchesRadius * 2, false);
00751                         Canvas maskCanvas = new Canvas(output);
00752                         
00753                         Path p = new Path();
00754                         p.addCircle(sBranchesRadius, sBranchesRadius, sBranchesRadius, Path.Direction.CW);
00755                         
00756                         maskCanvas.clipPath(p, Region.Op.DIFFERENCE);
00757                         maskCanvas.drawColor(0, PorterDuff.Mode.CLEAR);
00758                         
00759                         return output;
00760                 }
00761         }
